summary: This document is a formal revocation and termination of 'The Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust Two' executed by Jeffrey E. Epstein as Grantor. It details the trust's history, its trustees, and Epstein's exercise of his reserved right to revoke the trust and have all assets returned to him. The document is notarized on October 4, 2012.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: The creator and revoker of 'The Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust Two'. He executes this document to terminate the trust and have its assets returned to him.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Named as a Trustee in the Amended and Restated Trust Agreement and a current Trustee of the trust at the time of its revocation.

persons.name: Andrew Farkas
persons.context: Named as a Trustee in the Amended and Restated Trust Agreement and a current Trustee of the trust at the time of its revocation.

persons.name: Jeffrey A. Schantz
persons.context: Was an original Trustee under the initial 2001 Trust Agreement, but is not listed as a current Trustee at the time of revocation.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Was named as a Trustee in the 2012 Amended and Restated Trust Agreement but never executed it, and therefore was not a Trustee at the time of revocation.

connections.description: Epstein, as Grantor, appointed Indyke as a Trustee of his 2001 Trust Two and directs this revocation document to him.
Epstein, as Grantor, appointed Farkas as a Trustee of his 2001 Trust Two and directs this revocation document to him.
Both served as co-Trustees of The Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust Two at the time of its revocation.
Epstein named Staley as a Trustee in a 2012 trust amendment, though Staley never formally accepted the role.

events.title: Creation of 2001 Trust Two
events.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein creates 'The Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust Two' with himself and Jeffrey A. Schantz as Trustees.

events.title: Trust Amendment and Restatement
events.description: Epstein amends and restates the 2001 Trust Agreement, naming Darren K. Indyke, Jes Staley, and Andrew Farkas as the new Trustees.

events.title: Revocation of 2001 Trust Two
events.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein formally revokes and terminates The Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust Two, directing all assets be returned to him.

keyFacts: Jeffrey E. Epstein revoked and terminated 'The Jeffrey E. Epstein 2001 Trust Two' on October 4, 2012, directing all its assets be returned to him.

The trust had been amended in January 2012 to name Darren K. Indyke, Jes Staley, and Andrew Farkas as Trustees, but only Indyke and Farkas had executed the agreement and were serving as Trustees at revocation.
Epstein, as Grantor, reserved the right to unilaterally revoke the trust, which he exercised via this written instrument.
The document is a notarized legal instrument, indicating a formal and deliberate action to dissolve this financial entity.
